item.title: Blue Bird Corp 10-K
item.description: Blue Bird Corp, which is in the Truck & Bus Bodies [3713] industry, SEC 10-K filing on December 12, 2022 had 36477 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: fiscal - 525 instances 2022 - 385 instances company - 353 instances million - 349 instances 1 - 304 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
